_PAGE_FILTER_DATE_ARGUMENTS_VALUE_: The date or time to be formatted
_PAGE_FILTER_DATE_ARGUMENTS_FORMAT_: The display format for the date. Possible values: "date" (date), "datetime" (date and time), "fullDate" (full date and time), "time" (time), "timeWithSeconds" (time with seconds) or a valid format from moment.js
_PAGE_FILTER_DATE_DESCRIPTION_: The function filterDate uses the moment.js library to format dates and times. It takes a date or time value and returns it in the specified format. Note that moment.js is considered a deprecated library and is planned to be replaced by another solution in the future. There are also plans to expand the function to support various languages.
